text: @realDonaldTrump omg get over yourself, #Theworld is dealing with covid19 pandemic that’s killed over 100,000 people and #american citizen riots that’s irrupted due to the racism in America...How about addressing intellectual topics, not tweeting cheesy videos smoke & mirrors..#EnoughIsEnough
